chat_history.content:
# Day 1—Monday 7 March
## Morning
- Arrive in Denver, Colorado
- Check into accommodation (e.g. *NO GUEST SERVICE FEE* Luxury Studio Suite w/Free Continental Breakfast, $390 for two nights)

## Afternoon
- Visit the Denver Zoo (2300 Steele St), which has wildlife from all over the world
- Explore the Denver Botanic Gardens (1007 York St), a 24-acre botanical garden with an amphitheatre

## Evening
- Dine at The Fatty Bao—Asian Gastro Bar (93, average cost)
- Explore the nightlife at Meow Wolf Denver Convergence Station (1338 1st St), an immersive art and entertainment space

# Day 2—Tuesday 8 March
## Morning
- Visit the Denver Museum of Nature & Science (2001 Colorado Blvd), a natural history museum with a planetarium and IMAX theatre
- Wander around the Denver Art Museum (100 W 14th Ave Pkwy), which has a diverse collection of American Indian art

## Afternoon
- Enjoy lunch at The Urban Socialite (34, average cost)
- Explore the Molly Brown House Museum (1340 Pennsylvania St), dedicated to activist and Titanic survivor Margaret Brown
- Check out Confluence Park (2250 15th St), a park situated at the confluence of the South Platte River and Cherry Creek

## Evening
- Visit the Wings Over the Rockies Air & Space Museum (7711 E Academy Blvd)
- Have dinner at Woods Spice (69, average cost)

# Day 3—Wednesday 9 March
## Morning
- Travel to Colorado Springs (e.g. by bus for $30)
- Check into accommodation (e.g. Large Sunny Park Slope Apartment, $82 for one night)

## Afternoon
- Have lunch at Raglan Road Irish Pub and Restaurant (97, average cost)
- Visit The Broadmoor Seven Falls (1045 Lower Gold Camp Rd), a series of seven waterfalls
- Explore the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo (4250 Cheyenne Mountain Zoo Rd), which has over 750 animals

## Evening
- Enjoy dinner at Mukhtalif Biryanis (95, average cost)
- Check out the nightlife at The Loft (2506 W Colorado Ave)

# Day 4—Thursday 10 March
## Morning
- Visit the Garden of the Gods (1805 N 30th St), a public park with natural red-rock formations
- Explore the Manitou Cliff Dwellings (10 Cliff Rd), a museum showcasing ancient Anasazi cliff dwellings
- Check out North Cheyenne Cañon Park (2120 S Cheyenne Canyon Rd), a public park with hiking trails

## Afternoon
- Enjoy lunch at #Dilliwaala6 (26, average cost)
- Visit Miramont Castle Museum and The Queen's Parlour Tea Room (9 Capitol Hill Ave), a museum housed in a 19th-century castle
- Explore America the Beautiful Park, a park with lakes and walking trails

## Evening
- Have dinner at PizzaExpress (34, average cost)
- Explore the nightlife at The Public House (2547 W Colorado Ave)

# Day 5—Friday 11 March
## Morning
- Travel to Aurora (e.g. by bus for $40)
- Check into accommodation (e.g. Cozy Space-Sunny Studio-Flatbush, Brooklyn, $450 for two nights)

## Afternoon
- Have lunch at The Bent Nook (1015 S Peoria St)
- Visit the Aurora History Museum (15051 E Alameda Pkwy), which has exhibits on local history
- Explore Cherry Creek State Park (Aurora), a park with a reservoir, hiking trails, and picnic areas

## Evening
- Enjoy dinner at China Jade (3636 N Chambers Rd)
- Explore the nightlife at Stampede (2430 S Havana St)

# Day 6—Saturday 12 March
## Morning
- Visit the Aurora Fox Arts Center (9900 E Colfax Ave), a performing arts venue presenting musicals and plays
- Explore the Aurora Reservoir (5800 S Powhaton Rd), a reservoir with fishing, boating, and hiking trails

## Afternoon
- Have lunch at The French Press (15614 E Dahlia St)
- Visit the Aurora Hills Golf Course (50 S Peoria St), a public golf course with an 18-hole regulation course

## Evening
- Enjoy dinner at Rosie's Diner (15250 E Hampden Ave)
- Explore the nightlife at The Aurora Dam (10000 E Colfax Ave)

# Day 7—Sunday 13 March
## Morning
- Return to Wichita (e.g. by bus for $50)

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
